channel.title: League of Legends on Hugo Tailwind
channel.description: Recent content in League of Legends on Hugo Tailwind

item.title: League of Legends 2026 Season Changes
item.description: Riot Games announces massive jungle changes and a new void champion for the upcoming season.

item.title: League of Legends Worlds 2025: T1 Wins Fourth Championship
item.description: Faker and T1 dominate the finals 3-0 against JDG, securing their fourth World Championship title in an incredible display of skill.
